metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32629 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high.
metadata.Description: Local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ubuntu Kernels overlayfs ovl_copy_up_meta_inode_data skip permission checks when calling ovl_do_setxattr on Ubuntu kernels Shir Tamari and Sagi Tzadik discovered that the OverlayFS implementation in the Ubuntu Linux kernel did not properly perform permission checks in certain situations. A local attacker could possibly use this to gain elevated privileges.

notes.Note: eslerm> CWE-863 reported by Shir Tamari and Sagi Tzadik from Wiz Research

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
